subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: For only the third time, the Devils, the Rangers and the Islanders are all in the Stanley Cup playoffs. And for the first time, they will be skating in three separate opening-round series.
snippet: For only the third time, the Devils, the Rangers and the Islanders are all in the Stanley Cup playoffs. And for the first time, they will be skating in three separate opening-round series.
